channel.title: Github on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site

item.title: Git
item.description:
Force update specify commit id


git filter-repo --commit-callback '
if commit.original_id == b"45131da3ef02aa324590ee29b4d7417686950297":
 commit.author_name = b"NewName"
 commit.author_email = b"NewName@gmail.com"
 commit.committer_name = b"NewName"
 commit.committer_email = b"NewName@gmail.com"
'

Force update specify Author


git filter-repo --force --commit-callback '
old_author_name = "Old"
old_author_email = "Old"
new_author_name = "New"
new_author_email = "New"

if commit.author_name == old_author_name and commit.author_email == old_author_email:
 commit.author_name = new_author_name
 commit.author_email = new_author_email

if commit.committer_name == old_author_name and commit.committer_email == old_author_email:
 commit.committer_name = new_author_name
 commit.committer_email = new_author_email
'
